intro.value: If you’re looking to add a new furry friend to your family, you may have heard the phrase “Adopt Don’t Shop”.
But where do adoptable dogs in Washington come from?
This question can be complicated, but let’s start with a dog named Bleu.

introDog.value: Bleu was one of 1,265 dogs available for adoption in Washington on PetFinder.com, June 28, 2019. But like many other adoptable dogs in the state, Bleu didn’t originate in Washington.
